name: PKSClaudeDotNet10Full - Full-Featured .NET 10 with Claude AI
initializeCommand:
if [ ! -f .devcontainer/.env ]; then cat > .devcontainer/.env << 'EOF'
# Development Container Environment Variables
# This file contains environment variables for the development container

# GitHub Personal Access Token (PAT)
# Required for GitHub CLI authentication and API access
# Generate a token at: https://github.com/settings/tokens
# Recommended scopes: repo, read:org, workflow
github_pat_token=<insert_your_github_pat_here>

# Add your custom environment variables here
# Example:
# MY_API_KEY=your_api_key_here
# DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:pass@localhost:5432/dbname
EOF
fi
postCreateCommand: dotnet workload update && dotnet tool restore && dotnet restore && sudo /usr/local/bin/init-firewall.sh
